name: LivingProofHairCare
0:
”Alexa, open Living Proof.”
”Alexa, ask Living Proof, what is dry shampoo?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: living proof
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Learn about our product lines, what ingredients we avoid and which products are best for your hair type. 

After the Welcome Message, ask or tell Alexa what you want to learn about, for example:

- "Take the haircare quiz"
- "How do I find the right hair products for me?"
- "How do I prevent frizz?" 
 
Be sure to check back in regularly for hair care tips, product information, and more.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
